projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the resp attribute identifying the agency.

refsDecl.p:
A reference is given in the xml:id attributes consisting of
a pragmatic abbreviation of the title: Sevyasevakopadeśaḥ = KṣeSsu,
the number of the verse in arabic numerals.

lg.l: vibhūṣaṇāya mahate tṛṣṇātimirahāriṇe |
namaḥ saṃtoṣaratnāya sevāviṣavināśine ||
utsṛjya nijakāryāṇi sadbhir bāṣpākulekṣaṇam |
sevyasevakasevānāṃ kriyatām anuśāsanam ||
darpād ekaḥ paro lobhād dvāv andhau sevyasevakau |
dhanoṣmadainyavikṛtī mukhe kaḥ kasya paśyati ||
durvāramohalobhāndho yadi na syād ayaṃ janaḥ |
kaḥ krūrakrodhavidhuraṃ saheta dhanināṃ mukham ||
yaḥ pṛthvīm api darpāndho na paśyati puraḥsthitām |
sa dainyalaghutāṃ yātaṃ kathaṃ sevakam īkṣate ||
agatiṃ vāhayaty eko badhiraṃ stauti cāparaḥ |
aho jagati hāsyāya nirlajjau sevyasevakau ||
dūraṃ huṃkāramātreṇa visṛṣṭo mārgaṇaḥ sadā |
guṇabhraṣṭaḥ kriyāhīno nodvegaṃ yāti sevakaḥ ||
manye sukṛtinā tena bhāgīrathyāṃ kṛtaṃ tapaḥ |
vairāgyabhāgī rathyāṃ yaḥ sevāsu na vigāhate ||
kathitakleśavāpena śāpeneva vipākinā |
sevātāpena pacyante na hy aduṣkṛtino narāḥ ||
adainyapuṇyamanasāṃ yaśas teṣāṃ virājate |
sevāpaṅkakalaṅkānāṃ yair na pātrīkṛtaṃ śiraḥ ||
prabhupraṇāme jaṭharaṃ dainyamūkaṃ vilokayan |
praveṣṭuṃ sevakaḥ śaṅke vilakṣaḥ kṣitim īkṣate ||
sevādhvajo 'ñjalir mūrdhni hṛdi dainyaṃ mukhe stutiḥ |
āśāgrahagṛhītānāṃ kiyatīyaṃ viḍambanā ||
akālāgamanakrodhavidhureśvaracakṣuṣā |
kṣipraṃ smara ivāyāti sevako dugdhabhūtitām ||
punaḥ sevāvamānānāṃ tena dattaṃ tilodakam |
praviśya vāhinīṃ yena khaḍgapātrīkṛtaṃ vapuḥ ||
kaṇavṛttiparikliṣṭaḥ kaṣṭaṃ sevakacātakaḥ |
ghanāśānirato nityam udgrīvaḥ pariśuṣyati ||
niḥsaṃtoṣaḥ parityajya bhramaraḥ puṣpitaṃ vanam |
sevate dānalobhena mātaṅgam api sevakaḥ ||
jaḍasevāparikliṣṭas tīvradambhabakavrataḥ |
kṛcchreṇa kṣaṇikāṃ prītim āsādayati sevakaḥ ||
nityam unnatikāmo 'pi mānabhaṅgād adhomukhaḥ |
yat satyam ubhayabhraṣṭas triśaṅkur iva sevakaḥ ||
svamāṃsavikrayāsaktaḥ prabhuvetālaghaṭṭitaḥ |
niḥsattvaḥ pralayaṃ yāti rātrisevāsu sevakaḥ ||
bhūmiśāyī nirāhāraḥ śītavātātapakṣataḥ |
munivrato 'pi narakakleśam aśnāti sevakaḥ ||
karoti sevakaḥ sevāṃ tāvad āśām ivāyatām |
yāvad bhogarasajñena yauvanena viyujyate ||
cakṣur dvāry añjalau pāṇiḥ stutau jihvā natau śiraḥ |
aho nu sevakaiḥ kāyaḥ paropakaraṇīkṛtaḥ ||
hanta yācñāvamānena sevako laghutāṃ gataḥ |
sevāpaṅkapade magno yad anviṣṭo na labhyate ||
aviśrāntyāviraktasya dīrghocchvāsena śuṣyataḥ |
jareva duḥsahā jantoḥ sevā saṃkocakāriṇī ||
truṭyati klinnatantrīva māleva mlāyati kṣaṇāt |
sevā nāracayaty eva dinacchedena naśyati ||
sevāsaṃkṣapitāṅgānāṃ rājarathyāsu śuṣyatām |
tīvratṛṣṇāviṣārtānāṃ śaraṇam śamavāridaḥ ||
lobhasya mohādhvani vṛddhabhāve jātā durāśāśayitasya sevā |
adhomukhī sā satataṃ salajjā jaratkumārīva na kasya śocyā ||
āśeva śūnyeṣu vivartamānā tṛṣṇeva saṃtoṣaparāṅmukhīyam |
divāniśaṃ karṣaṇadīrgharajjuḥ sevā surāṇām api dainyabhūmiḥ ||
nisargavandhyāsu phalāśayā ye kurvanti sevāsu sadā prayatnam |
kṛṣipravṛttāḥ śaśaśṛṅgakoṭyā khananti mūrkhāḥ khalu svasthalīṃ te ||
antaḥsthite 'py ātmani yaiḥ kriyante sevāpravṛttaiḥ puruṣaiḥ praṇāmāḥ |
dugdhābdikallolini kūlakacche tṛṣṇāturās te jalam arthayante ||
bhāgīrathītīravanāntareṣu phalāvanamreṣu mahādrumeṣu |
kṣuttāpatṛṣṇāśamaneṣu satsu kiṃ dainyasevāvyasanāvamānaiḥ ||
nityaprasaktyā na sṛjaty avajñāṃ na laulyagarhāgaṇanāṃ karoti |
atyantayācñāsu na yāti khedaṃ bhikṣābhujām pātram ato nu sevyam ||
jayanti te svasti namo 'stu tebhyaḥ prabhūpraṇāmacyutamānaratnam |
sevāprayāsavyasaneṣu mithyā rathyārajobhāgi śiro na yeṣām ||
kiṃ rājabhir durjanajanmajālavyāptair avāptair api kaṣṭadṛṣṭaiḥ |
santy eva sevyā bhuvi bhūbhṛtas te taṭeṣu yeṣāṃ munayo niviṣṭāḥ ||
tṛṣṇāturāṇāṃ rajasā vṛtānāṃ sevākukūlānalatāpitānām |
śāntyai hitaṃ candrakirīṭajūṭamaitrīpavitraṃ tridaśāpagāmbhaḥ ||
utsṛjya tīvraṃ viṣayābhilāṣaṃ saṃtoṣapoṣaṃ kuśalo bhajasva |
ity arthyamānaḥ sukhasevayāyam ātmāiva sarvaṃ sudhiyāṃ dadāti ||
ekasya jāne sukhabhogabhājaḥ ślāghyasya sevāvyasanaṃ nivṛttam |
sadaiva śiśnodaravarjitatvād ayācyayācñārahitasya rahoḥ ||
sevāvrate prāya ivāpaviṣṭaḥ sarvātmanā niścitajīvanāśaḥ |
dvāḥsthaiḥ prayatnena nivārito 'pi na durgrahaṃ muñcati naṣṭasaṃjñaḥ ||
tamo'dhvatāpena ca cintayā ca śitena dainyena ca piṇḍitāṅgaḥ |
sukhāśayā duḥkhasahasrabhāgī sevāvrataṃ mugdhamatir bibharti ||
gacchāmi gacchāmi dinaṃ gataṃ me dine gato 'haṃ na nṛpo 'dya dṛṣṭaḥ |
iti bruvāṇasya sadā janasya jīrṇātarāṃ tasya tanur na tṛṣṇā ||
vicchedakārī sahasā kathānām anīpsito dīpa iva praviṣṭaḥ |
saṃsaktavastrāntaramakṣikeva na sevakaḥ kasya karoti duḥkham ||
dhūmāyamāno 'kṣivipakṣabhūtaś cāṭukramotpāditakarṇaśūlaḥ |
kusevakaḥ pādatale 'valagnaḥ pade pade kaṇṭakatām upaiti ||
ekaḥ kham eva kṣitim īkṣate 'nyaḥ sa nirjanārthī sa ca gāḍhalagnaḥ |
svasvārthitā tasya bhṛśaṃ sa cārthī kathaṃ sa sevyaḥ sa ca sevako 'stu ||
chāyāgraho mūrta ivānuyāyī sthitaś ciraṃ vṛścikaniścalaś ca |
akālapātī sukhakelilīlāyantrotpalaḥ sevakadurvidagdhaḥ ||
visṛjyamāno 'py aniśaṃ na yāti tīvroparodhapraṇayena mūrkhaḥ |
bhartuḥ prasāde vihitaprayatno jātaḥ paraṃ pratyuta kopahetuḥ ||
śūtkāridīrghaśvasitānubandhair niveditodvegagatiprayāsaḥ |
atipraveśāt kharamārgaṇo 'sau nirasyamāno viphalatvam eti ||

śrīratnacandravaravājigajorjite 'smin
gambhīrarājakulanāmni mahāsamudre |

aśnāti mūḍhamatir īśvaratām avāptum
āśāvaśāt kṣitipater bahu kālakūṭam ||

virama virama neyaṃ pāntha namrāmramālā
badhira khadirapālī niṣphalaiṣā prayāhi |

iti bahuvidham uktaḥ sevako 'nyāpadeśais
tyajati na vipulāśāpāśabaddhaḥ kusevām ||

pramlānā sarasatvam eti na punar māleva lagnātapā
bhagnā kācamayīva saṃdhighaṭanā yogena na śliṣyati |

sevā dīpaśikheva durgatagṛhe saṃdhāryamāṇā paraṃ
niḥsnehā kṣayam eti khedajanitair ucchvāsamālānilaiḥ ||

kas tvaṃ gatvara sevakas tvaritatā kasmāt prabhur dṛśyate
lābhaḥ kas tava tatra vetrivipulāghātaiḥ śirastāḍanam |

kiṃ mṛdgāsi mudā viśālacaraṇair mithyaiva rathyām imām
bandho vandhyanarendrabhavyabhavanabhrāntyā viḍambyāmahe ||

suptākarṣaṇadāma dhāma mahato mohasya dainyasya vā
sevākleśam aharniśaṃ viṣahate yo vittaleśāśayā |

prasphūrjadvaḍavāgnigarbhagahanodbhūtormimālākulaṃ
saṃkṣubdhaṃ makarākaraṃ praviśati śrīratnalabdhyai na kim ||

vyarthātyarthagatāgatavyatikarair aśrāntatīvratvaro
dvārālokanatatparaḥ parijanair utsāryamāṇaḥ param |

yatnenaiva puraḥ praveśakalanaiḥ kleśāvamānāśrayaḥ
sarvāpatpiśunaḥ śunaḥ sadṛśatām ālapsyate sevakaḥ ||

kūjatkrūrakapāṭapīḍanaruṣā dattaprahāraiḥ paraṃ
dvārāvasthaganāya susthirabhujair dvāḥsthair bhṛśaṃ bhartsitaḥ |

kubjībhūya janasya jānuvivaraiḥ kṣiprapraveśotsukaḥ
pṛcchaty antaranirgatānavasaraṃ maunavratān sevakaḥ ||

dvāre ruddham upekṣate katham api prāptaṃ puro nekṣate
vijñaptau gajamīlanāni kurute gṛhṇāti vākyacchalam |

niryātasya karoti doṣagaṇanāṃ svalpāparādhe yamaḥ
sa svāmī yadi sevyate marutaṭe kiṃ naḥ piśācaiḥ kṛtam ||

nityaṃ rājakule na pūjyayajane taddvārapālārcanaṃ
bhaktiṃ bhūtisamudbhave na tu bhave dhyānaṃ dhane nātmani |

dṛṣṭādṛṣṭavicintanaṃ narapatau na svocite karmaṇi
śrīhetor bata niṣphalaṃ prakurute sarvaṃ jaḍaḥ sevakaḥ ||

sā tīvraṃ jaḍanimnapātanaratā no nityasaktā tvarā
rathyāpaṅkakalaṅkitaṃ na vadanaṃ na dvārapālaiḥ kaliḥ |

yasmiṃs taccirasevakaḥ pravitataṃ puṇyaṃ vanaṃ gamyatāṃ
krūrās te na bhavanti tatra vikṛtakrodhoddhatāḥ pārthivāḥ ||

haṃho kaṣṭavinaṣṭa sevaka sakhe khinno 'si poṣāśayā
rāgaś ced vibhave tad eṣa kupatiḥ klībaḥ kim āsevyate |

sevyaḥ ko 'pi maheśvaraḥ sa bhagavān yasya prasādekṣaṇair
akṣuṇṇaiḥ karuṇāspadīkṛtamarunnātho maruttaḥ kṛtaḥ ||

rājñām ajñatayā kṛtaṃ yad aniśaṃ dainyaṃ tad utsṛjyatāṃ
saṃtoṣambhasi mṛjyatām api rajaḥ pādapraṇāmārjitam |

saṃtoṣaḥ paramaḥ purāṇapuruṣaḥ saṃvinmayaḥ sevyatāṃ
yatsmṛtyā na bhavanti te sumanasāṃ bhūyo bhavagranthayaḥ ||

utsṛjya prājyasevāṃ vijanasukhajuṣāṃ bhūbhujāṃ vyājabhājāṃ
chittvāśāpāśabandhān vimalaśamajalais tīvratṛṣṇāṃ nivārya |

sthitva śuddhe samādhau kim aparam amṛtaṃ mṛgyatāṃ jyotir antar
yasmin dṛṣṭe vinaṣṭotkaṭatimirabhare labhayte mokṣalakṣmīḥ ||
vṛttyā jīvati lokaḥ sevāvṛttir nijaiva keṣāṃcit |
asthāne tīvratarā nindyā tu tadarthināṃ sevā ||
vidvajjanārādhanatatpareṇa saṃtoṣasevārasanirbhareṇa |
kṣemendranāmnā sudhiyāṃ sadaiva sukhāya sevāvasaraḥ kṛto 'yam ||
